y="114.28571428571429" width="100" height="37.75714285714286" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="W3DnAQh98k6CqNf9Bhiu-7" value="<p style=""><br></p><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">You are generating a single restaurant review sentence.</font></span></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">The sentence must mention the given aspect and reflect the given sentiment.&nbsp;</font></span></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Use natural human-like language, realistic and rich vocabulary.</span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Output: one sentence of maximum 20 words. Stop after generating 1 sentence.&nbsp;</span></font></div><div style=""><br></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Aspect: calamari rings</span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Sentiment: positive</span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Output: </span><font style="font-size: 11px;">I've had the calamari rings at a number of restaurants, and this place does it the best.</font></font></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></font></span></div><div style=""><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Aspect: meat</span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Sentiment: positive</span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Output:</span></font></div></div><div style=""><br></div><div><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 11px;" face="Courier New">The meat was cooked perfectly, and the flavors were&nbsp;</font><span style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 11px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: transparent;">spot-on.</span></div><div><div><br></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;shadow=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="102.78841236496608" width="430" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="W3DnAQh98k6CqNf9Bhiu-10" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="730" width="415" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="W3DnAQh98k6CqNf9Bhiu-12" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="107.5" y="220" width="415" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 97px; height: 1px; padding-top: 28px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
